itemManagementDomain

Class PlayListManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • itemManagementDomain.PlayListManager

  • public class PlayListManager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayListManager()
      Default Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem()
      addItem is a method that adds an Item to the itemList ArrayList.
      void createItemList()
      createItemList is a method to put all the playlist items into an ArrayList.
      void createRandPlayListFile()
      createRandPlayListFile creates an output file for the randomized playlist.
      void deleteItem()
      deleteItem is a method that will remove an Item from the ArrayList itemList
      java.util.ArrayList<Item> getRandList()
      getRandList is a method to return a random list of the Items in the playlist file.
      void printFilteredCommercialList(char categorySelection)
      printFilteredCommercialList is a method that prints a filtered playList based on user input.
      void printFilteredSongList(char categorySelection)
      printFilteredSongist is a method that prints a filtered playList based on user input.
      void printFilteredTalkShowList(char categorySelection)
      printFilteredTalkShowList is a method that prints a filtered playList based on user input.
      void printFullList()
      printFullList is a method that prints the entire playList.
      void saveChanges()
      saveChanges is a method that will re-write all the changes the user made to the ArrayList itemList to the input file PLAYLIST_FILE.
      void showSearchedId()
      showSearchedId is a method to print an Item that has been searched using searchById method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createItemList

        public void createItemList()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        createItemList is a method to put all the playlist items into an ArrayList. Items are found in a text file.

        printFullList is a method that prints the entire playList.

        Parameters:
        categorySelection - is a char of the category the user selected to see.

      • showSearchedId

        public void showSearchedId()
        showSearchedId is a method to print an Item that has been searched using searchById method.

      • getRandList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getRandList()
        getRandList is a method to return a random list of the Items in the playlist file. It will only return items that add up to plus or minus 30 seconds of a user's input.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of the randomly selected items.

      • createRandPlayListFile

        public void createRandPlayListFile()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        createRandPlayListFile creates an output file for the randomized playlist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for IO

      • saveChanges

        public void saveChanges()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        saveChanges is a method that will re-write all the changes the user made to the ArrayList itemList to the input file PLAYLIST_FILE.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for IO
